mapper.select: select discussion_no,id,title,content,to_char(discussion_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') as discussion_date,hit,discussion_subject from discussion where discussion_no=#{value}

select discussion_comment_no,id,discussion_no,content,to_char(discussion_comment_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') as discussion_comment_date,ref,restep,relevel from discussion_comment where discussion_no=#{value} order by ref asc,restep asc
mapper.insert:
select discussion_comment_no.nextval from dual
insert into discussion_comment(discussion_comment_no,id,discussion_no,content,discussion_comment_date,ref,restep,relevel) values(#{commentNo},#{id},#{boardNo},#{content},sysdate,#{commentNo},0,0)

select discussion_no.nextval from dual
insert into discussion(discussion_no,id,title,content,discussion_date,hit,discussion_subject) values(#{discussionNo},#{id},#{title},#{content},sysdate,0,#{discussionSubject})
mapper.select: select discussion_comment_no,id,discussion_no,content,to_char(discussion_comment_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') as discussion_comment_date,ref,restep,relevel from discussion_comment where discussion_comment_no=#{value}
mapper.update: update discussion_comment set content=#{content} where discussion_comment_no =#{commentNo}
update discussion set hit=hit+1 where discussion_no =#{discussionNo}
update discussion_comment set restep = restep+1 where ref = #{ref} and restep > #{reStep}
